author: world today news
title: Burgas Mayor Honors Top Students
text:
In a ⁢heartwarming ceremony held on the eve of Burgas’s patron saint day, ⁢Nikulden, Mayor Dimitar Nikolov honored the city’s brightest young minds. ‍The sixth annual awards⁣ ceremony,​ held at the Congress‍ Center, celebrated ⁣the exceptional⁢ achievements⁢ of‌ Burgas students ⁢in academics, science, sports, and the arts.
This year’s ceremony ​was particularly special, ⁢with a record-breaking‌ 640 students achieving ​top​ honors in national and international competitions. Mayor Nikolov lauded the dedication ‍of teachers, parents, and students, calling‌ it ‍a “triple holiday.”
“This year we have a record – 640 talented‍ children ‍have won first ⁣places at national and from⁣ first to third place at international competitions. This is ⁤a‍ triple holiday ‌- a ​holiday for teachers,‍ because during the year they persistently stood by the children and ​supported them,‌ encouraged them,⁣ cleaned up all the ‌weaknesses⁢ so‌ that they​ could reach the top. The second party is for parents,grandparents who have⁤ supported thier talents ​and initiatives. They stood⁢ behind them‌ in every⁢ challenging moment outside the ‌school building and encouraged them.And the third is⁢ for the ⁤children themselves!”
Mayor‍ Dimitar Nikolov Mayor Nikolov expressed his⁣ hope that these talented young Burgas residents woudl choose to ‍stay in Bulgaria⁢ and contribute⁢ to the​ nation’s future. He emphasized ​the importance of ‍nurturing ⁤local talent and⁤ fostering a brighter future for the country.
“I ‌would⁤ be more happy ​if they stay in Burgas,⁤ in Bulgaria to develop this talent. A time will come when Bulgarian ⁣talents‌ will stay here, create and develop science, educate others, and then our country will ‍have an even better future. I dream⁢ of this moment!⁣ thank you, dear children, for your efforts! The Municipality ⁢of Burgas supports and stands ​behind ​each ​and every prosperous young fellow citizen of ours! On the eve of Nicholas Day, I wish⁢ you a​ happy holiday!”
Mayor⁣ Nikolov The ceremony commenced with ⁢the ‍prestigious “Student of the​ Year” award presented to Taisia Zenkovic,​ a student at the Burgas⁤ Free University.
## ‍ Investing in the Future: A ⁢Conversation with​ Mayor Nikolov on Recognizing Burgas’ ‍Young ‍Achievers
**World Today News:** ‍ Mayor Nikolov, thank⁤ you for taking ⁢the time to speak with us today. the annual awards ceremony honoring Burgas’s brightest young minds‌ is a truly ⁢inspiring event. Can you tell us more⁣ about ‍its significance?
**Mayor nikolov:** It is my⁤ pleasure. This​ ceremony is more⁤ than just ⁢handing out awards. It’s about investing in the ‌future of Burgas.⁤ These young people – the students who excel in academics, science, sports, and the arts ‍- represent the vibrancy and potential of our city. By‌ recognizing their achievements, we ⁤are not⁣ only celebrating their ⁢individual successes but also encouraging ⁤a culture of excellence and ambition among all our young citizens.
**World⁢ Today​ News:** How does the city of Burgas support these young achievers beyond⁤ the award ceremony itself?
**Mayor Nikolov:** We believe in providing⁤ a thorough ecosystem for nurturing talent. This includes strong educational institutions, ‌well-equipped facilities for sports and arts, and mentorship⁣ programs connecting young people with⁤ experienced professionals. We also ⁣actively seek partnerships with businesses and ‌organizations to offer internships and scholarships, bridging the gap ⁣between education and real-world experience.
**World⁣ Today ‌News:** ‌the ceremony ⁢coincided with the‍ eve of Burgas’s ‌patron saint day, Nikulden. Is there ⁤a symbolic connection​ between celebrating​ the ⁣city’s​ patron saint ​and honoring⁣ its young achievers?
**Mayor Nikolov:** Absolutely. nikulden is a‍ day ​of reflection and gratitude‍ for the blessings bestowed upon our city.What better way to express our gratitude than by⁤ celebrating⁣ the ⁤very essence of Burgas’s future – its ‍young people? Their⁤ achievements are a testament to the spirit of innovation, perseverance, and community that⁢ defines our city.
**World⁢ Today ​News:**‌ Looking‍ ahead, what‌ are your hopes and aspirations for these burgeoning​ talents?
**Mayor⁢ Nikolov:** We aspire to see these young people become leaders ​in their‍ chosen fields – not ​just for Burgas, but for ⁢Bulgaria and the world. We want ​them to be ⁢proud ⁣ambassadors of our ‌city,⁢ showcasing their talents and contributing to a brighter future for all.
**World Today News:**​ Thank you, Mayor Nikolov, for your time and⁣ insights. This event ⁢is a true testament to the commitment of Burgas to ⁤nurturing its future.
⁤**We wish all ⁤the awardees continued success and radiant futures.**
